data.name: Heroes & Generals - Essential Ribbon Booster Pack
data.detailed_description:
Introducing the ‘Essential Ribbon Booster Pack’, a selection of the most essential ribbon boosters to supercharge the progression speed of all your soldiers!

Contents
  • 2x Infantry Assault
  • SMG assault
  • LMG assault
  • Explosives
  • 2x Driver
  • 2x Chauffeur
  • 2x Tactical
  • 3x Squad member
  • 3x Squad leader
  • 3x Physical Training
  • Battle

Ribbon Boosters will accelerate the progress on all your soldiers during combat. Veteran members will receive the boost on top of the boost from the membership.

data.short_description: Introducing the ‘Essential Ribbon Booster Pack’, a selection of the most essential ribbon boosters to supercharge the progression speed of all your soldiers!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and up
  • Processor: 2GHz CPU w. dual-core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI HD 4810 / Nvidia 9600GT or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD HD 6870 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
